name: Life & Debt: A Real Life Simulator
summary: Life & Debt: A Real Life Simulator is a 2D pixel art life management simulator. Life & Debt focuses on the beginnings of new home ownership after moving out of your parents' house. You will have to maintain your finances and cashflow while having a really bad shopping addiction. Will you be able to furnish your house with everything or will you end up hoarding clocks or waterbottles?
